issue.title: N4461 Static if resurrected, N3329 Proposal: static if declaration

discussion.p: Reviewed by EWG in Portland 2012, deemed to be handled by the Concepts Study Group (SG8).
Deemed post-C++14 material in Chicago 2013. SG8 isn't including it in their scope for the near future. Voutilainen is planning to write a simplified proposal for C++17.
Discussed in Lenexa. EWG encouraged the author to come back in Kona with a more detailed proposal.
